alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 3:19AM MST until March 02 at 8:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM WEDNESDAY TO 8 AM MST THURSDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow showers late Tuesday night and early Wednesday will become heavier and more widespread Wednesday afternoon and into Wednesday night. Southwest winds of 15 to 25 mph, with gusts from 35 to 45 mph, will create areas of blowing and drifting snow. * WHERE...Areas above 4000 feet near Forest Lakes, Heber- Overgaard, Payson and Pine-Strawberry. * WHEN...From 11 AM Wednesday to 8 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Snow forecast from 11 AM Wednesday to 8 AM Thursday: Forest Lakes 14 to 20 inches Heber-Overgaard 7 to 11 inches Payson 5 to 9 inches Pine-Strawberry 10 to 16 inches .
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Northern Gila County
